name: CloudWire
overview: CloudWire focuses on delivering true business email and email-based communication apps in the cloud. Ideal for small and medium size businesses, CloudWire is powered by Microsoft Exchange Server, delivering mobile push-email synchronization while providing full Outlook and web experience for email, calendar, contacts, files and collaboration tools in a platform that is up-and-running in minutes. CloudWire technology and cloud capability enables your organization to utilize advanced communications IT systems without the need to deploy in-house systems but rather the service is delivered to you over the cloud (Internet), and hosted in state-of-the-art , Tier 4 data-centers. It also allows you to scale usage on-demand and based on your current needs. We are passionate about delivering enterprise-class service by removing the in-house deployment headache and providing you with a full cloud-based communication solution.
